definitions.definition: to act according to what you have been asked or ordered to do by someone in authority, or to behave according to a rule, law, or instruction:
to behave according to a scientific principle:
examples: Falling objects obey the law of gravity.

definitions.definition: If your body or part of your body does not obey you, it does not work in the way it should:
examples: She was so tired her legs just wouldn't obey her any longer.
